\def\cleardoublepage{%
	\clearpage
	\if@twoside
	\ifodd\c@page
	\else
	\hbox{}\newpage\stepcounter{blankpages}%
	\thispagestyle{empty}%
	\if@twocolumn\hbox{}\newpage\fi
	\fi
	\fi
}
\newcommand{\@romannoblank}[1]{%
	\@roman{\numexpr#1-\value{blankpages}\relax}% 
}
